languages.text: Странное и пугающее открытие было сделано в одной из точек этой ледяной планеты. В прозрачной толще ледника находились бесчисленные тела людей. На телах не было заметно ранений. Они выглядели так, словно нырнули в воду, когда она еще не обернулась льдом, и затем застыли там навсегда — волосы развеваются, глаза обращены к небу.

A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.
languages.original_text: Странное и пугающее открытие было сделано в одной из точек этой ледяной планеты. В прозрачной толще ледника находились бесчисленные тела людей. На телах не было заметно ранений. Они выглядели так, словно нырнули в воду, когда она еще не обернулась льдом, и затем застыли там навсегда — волосы развеваются, глаза обращены к небу.

traits.locale_text: This frozen world hides a grim unsolved mystery. An uncountable number of human bodies can be seen in the clear ice of a glacier. All of the bodies look uninjured. Their eyes are wide open, their hair floes behind them, it's as if they dived into liquid water that turned into solid ice in a matter of seconds.

A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.

A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.

A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.

languages.text: 船员们在这个冰雪世界的某个地方发现了古怪而又恐怖的场面——无数人类的尸体悬浮在冰川的透明冰层中。这些尸体完全没有受伤的迹象，就仿佛他们前一刻潜入水中，后一刻就被立刻冻成了冰。他们瞪大了眼睛，头发在身后飘舞。
languages.original_text: A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.

traits.locale_text: 船员们在这个冰雪世界的某个地方发现了古怪而又恐怖的场面——无数人类的尸体悬浮在冰川的透明冰层中。这些尸体完全没有受伤的迹象，就仿佛他们前一刻潜入水中，后一刻就被立刻冻成了冰。他们瞪大了眼睛，头发在身后飘舞。

languages.text: Se realizó un descubrimiento extraño e inquietante en este mundo congelado: innumerables cuerpos humanos suspendidos en el hielo transparente de un glaciar. Los cuerpos no presentaban ninguna herida. Era como si se hubieran sumergido en agua líquida instantes antes de que se convirtiera en hielo, congelándolos con los ojos abiertos y el pelo extendido tras ellos.
languages.original_text: A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.

traits.locale_text: Se realizó un descubrimiento extraño e inquietante en este mundo congelado: innumerables cuerpos humanos suspendidos en el hielo transparente de un glaciar. Los cuerpos no presentaban ninguna herida. Era como si se hubieran sumergido en agua líquida instantes antes de que se convirtiera en hielo, congelándolos con los ojos abiertos y el pelo extendido tras ellos.

languages.text: 凍てつく世界のとある場所で、奇妙な恐ろしいものが見つかる。透明な氷河の中に、無数の人間の死体が吊るされていたのだ。死体に傷はない。まるで氷になる前の液体に飛び込んだかのように、目を見開き、髪を振り乱して、その場に固まっている。
languages.original_text: A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.

traits.locale_text: 凍てつく世界のとある場所で、奇妙な恐ろしいものが見つかる。透明な氷河の中に、無数の人間の死体が吊るされていたのだ。死体に傷はない。まるで氷になる前の液体に飛び込んだかのように、目を見開き、髪を振り乱して、その場に固まっている。

languages.text: Auf dieser gefrorenen Welt wurde eine merkwürdige, furchterregende Entdeckung gemacht — unzählige menschliche Leichen, eingeschlossen im klaren Eis eines Gletschers. Die Leichen zeigten keinerlei Anzeichen von Verletzungen. Es war, als wären sie in flüssiges Wasser getaucht, das sich in der nächsten Sekunde in festes Eis verwandelte und sie mit geöffneten Augen und nach hinten wehenden Haaren einfror.
languages.original_text: A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.

traits.locale_text: Auf dieser gefrorenen Welt wurde eine merkwürdige, furchterregende Entdeckung gemacht — unzählige menschliche Leichen, eingeschlossen in dem klaren Eis eines Gletshres. Die Leichen zeigten keinerlei Anzeichen von Verletzungen. Es war, als wären sie in flüssiges Wasser getaucht, das sich in der nächsten Sekunde in festes Eis verwandelte und sie mit geöffneten Augen und nach hinten wehenden Haaren einfror.

languages.text: Une découverte étrange et effrayante a été réalisée dans l'un des sites de ce monde gelé : une multitude de corps humains enfermés dans la glace cristalline d'une montagne. Les corps ne présentent aucun signe de blessure. C'est comme s'ils avaient plongé dans de l'eau liquide juste avant qu'elle ne se solidifie, les gelant sur place avec leurs yeux grand ouverts et leurs cheveux flottant derrière leur tête.
languages.original_text: A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.

traits.locale_text: Une découverte étrange et effrayante a été réalisée dans l'un des sites de ce monde gelé : une multitude de corps humains enfermés dans la glace cristalline d'une montagne. Les corps ne présentent aucun signe de blessure. C'est comme s'ils avaient plongé dans de l'eau liquide juste avant qu'elle ne se solidifie, les gelant sur place avec leurs yeux grand ouverts et leurs cheveux flottant derrière leur tête.

languages.text: Bu donuk dünyadaki bölgelerden birinde garip ve korkunç bir keşif yapılmış. Sayısız insan cesedi, bir buzulun berrak buzunda asılı hâlde bulunmuş. Cesetlerde hiçbir yaralanma belirtisi olmayıp sanki sıvı suya dalmış, gözleri açık ve saçları dağınık vaziyette oldukları yerde donup katılaşan buzun içinde hapsolmuşlar.
languages.original_text: A strange and frightening discovery was made at one of the sites on this frozen world — countless human bodies suspended in the clear ice of a glacier. The bodies showed no signs of injury. It was as if they dived into liquid water the moment before it turned to solid ice, freezing them in place with their eyes wide open and their hair fanning out behind them.
